name: Recipe: Trembling Strings and Rushing Reeds
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Trembling Strings and Rushing Reeds.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Ham
customize.desc: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

customize.name: Pepper
customize.desc: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

customize.name: Trembling Strings and Rushing Reeds
customize.desc: A unique meat dish. A variety of shredded meat is kneaded and fried for flavor. The complex ingredients and different textures make this dish quite the test of a chef's skills and is a rarity even in some of the most well-known restaurants.
